Family Sharing

Family Sharing is supported for both in-app purchases and subscriptions. Learn more about Family Sharing 623

Tips for Family Sharing (iOS 14.2 and later)

Family member(s) have been added to Family Sharing 149 (with Purchase Sharing enabled)
For monthly/yearly subscriptions, ensure sharing has been enabled in the Infuse subscription page (App Store > Subscriptions > Infuse)
Tap the Restore button on the purchase prompt (if it appears)
Note: In some cases it may be necessary to delete and re-download the app from the main family memberâ€™s list of Purchased apps in the App Store.

Alternative option for Family Sharing via Trakt

Family member(s) have been added to Family Sharing 149 (not required if accounts are in different App Store regions)
Log in to Trakt on the purchaserâ€™s device, and then the same Trakt account on other devices
